metadata.title: CVE-2023-28370 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Open redirect vulnerability in Tornado versions 6.3.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web site and conduct a phishing attack by having user access a specially crafted URL.

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> until salt version v3006.1, tornado source was included as vendored code.

criterions.comment: python-tornado package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
salt package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
